name: Rusty's Diner
description:
Here at Rusty's Diner, its all about keeping your customers happy. As the new owner of the diner, it is your job to prepare meals that customers order. Be fast!

Made for the Welton King game jam

Inspired by Texan style restaurants and Overcooked

Controls:
WASD or arrows

E to enteract

Num. keys to get iteams from fridge
